comment: Absolutely fantastic stay! The service was exceptional and the rooms were luxurious. The view from my room was breathtaking. Highly recommended for anyone visiting New York.
Great location and very professional staff. The hotel is well-maintained and the amenities are top-notch. Only minor complaint was the noise from the street at night.
Perfect beach getaway! The resort exceeded all expectations. Beautiful beach, amazing pool area, and the spa treatments were incredible. Will definitely return.
Lovely resort with great facilities. The beach access is convenient and the restaurant serves excellent food. Good value for a luxury resort.
Excellent for business trips. The meeting rooms are well-equipped and the location is very convenient for downtown Chicago. Staff was helpful throughout my stay.
What a gem! The mountain views are spectacular and the lodge has such a cozy atmosphere. Perfect for a weekend getaway from the city.
Basic but clean accommodation. Good value for money. The breakfast was decent and the staff was friendly. Perfect for budget travelers.
Stunning ocean views and spacious suites! The kitchen facilities were very convenient. Beach access was perfect and the pool area was beautiful.
Charming historic hotel with character. The location is perfect for exploring Boston. Rooms are comfortable and the restaurant serves excellent food.
Modern and efficient hotel perfect for business travelers. High-speed internet worked flawlessly and the business center had everything I needed.
Nice hotel but overpriced for what you get. The service was good but the rooms felt dated despite the luxury branding.
Amazing beach resort! The staff went above and beyond to make our vacation special. The spa was incredible and the food was outstanding.
Solid business hotel with good amenities. The gym was well-equipped and the breakfast buffet had good variety. Would stay again.
Absolutely loved this lodge! The mountain setting is peaceful and the rooms are cozy. Great hiking trails nearby and the restaurant serves delicious local cuisine.
Good budget option with clean rooms and friendly staff. The location is convenient and parking was easy. Great value for the price.
